main event: UFO sightings reported over Hawaii on January 24, 1967, involving multiple witnesses including military observers.
interesting points: The object was described as a circular disc, bigger and brighter than an average star., The sighted object appeared to grow several times larger than the full moon at its greatest size., Reports indicated instances of lights in the sky across various positions, causing considerable publicity., Observers noted a halo effect surrounding the object, with movements leading to a pinwheel effect reported by ground observers., The incident created a wave of sightings reported to local media.
sighted object: circular disc with a halo effect
